TopicTitle: Continue on the story, and fly free!

Articles.Content:
I haven't made a forum game yet, But I guess ill give it a try.

I'm going to say a beginning of a story, and you add to it!

RULES:

I want this to be totally random, so you can make the story do a 359 degree turn, Plotwists are allowed.

You're additon must have a minimum of 100 characters.

Keep it space oriented! Let's keep it KSP-ey and having to do with space.

No endings. Like no "and then the ship crashes"

EXAMPLE:

Dcseal:

There was once a kerbal named mac kerman and then one day...

xXDunaFTWXx:

And then he flew to duna

Starting off...

Kerbal Space Program Had a new rocket..

3..

2..

1....

LIFTOFF

The rocket rises, off on it's maydien (Is it Mayden or Maydien?!) voyage too.....
One thing that you should probably add is that a user will have to leave a reply to notify that they're in the process of writing (Like Ethan did) so no ninja-ing can occur.
when they finally realized they had not brought any parachutes...
But who really cares about some generic Mun lander, Jeb had just launched the brand new Nuclear STS anyway.
But it goes into a inclined retrograde orbit.
In the meanwhile Barman Kerman play a mini easter eggs fishing game @ the KSC shore ;
Then he fished out a old Mk1 Inline Cockpit
Which turns out to have a kerbal in it...
...which prompted Ghenghis Kerman, warlord of the steppes, to...

Take over the solar system and PLOT TWIST! A singular Laythean fish takes the solar system over and is Supreme General Admiral of the Great Kerbol System. (I, I don't know what I was doing there. I'm sorry.)
But it implodes because of its mass and becomes a kerbol system sized black hole.
but someone brings KittopiaTech and turns the black hole into GP2.
Then it reverts to a black hole because KittopiaTech is not for 1.05.
